page.title: 13Supernatural
page.content: {Blue Lady:}A ghost who haunted Kingsdown until forty years ago when last seen.Whenever sighted she brought good luck to the village. {Ghost of Dicky Whisbey:}One evening a drunken sailor walked from the Kingshead pub,swung a cat against a wall and killed it.It now haunts Rose Cottage. {Ottey Bottom Track:}A place where dogs are said to run with raised hackles. {Witches Walk:}People describe a terror of being followed and the sound of soldiers marching towards them. {Ghosts of the Tumuli:}One evening a boy and girl were walking along Kingsdown cliffs in a line with the tumuli when the girl started crying"didnt you see the horse and rider go screaming over the cliff?"the boy saw and heard nothing.
